normalised: E V Charging News: Auto Category

unnormalised: **EV Charging Getting Easier Than Finding a Decent Chai Stall!**
normalised: E V Charging Getting Easier Than Finding a Decent Chai Stall!

unnormalised: Mumbai: Forget range anxiety, folks! The EV revolution is picking up speed faster than a Rohit Shetty chase scene. IIT Bombay just announced a major breakthrough in fast-charging tech, promising near-full charges in under 30 minutes.
normalised: Mumbai: Forget range anxiety, folks! The E V revolution is picking up speed faster than a Rohit Shetty chase scene. I I T Bombay just announced a major breakthrough in fast-charging tech, promising near-full charges in under thirty minutes.

unnormalised: "We're aiming to make charging as convenient as filling petrol," said Prof. Sharma from IIT-B. "Think 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge,' but instead of Raj and Simran on the train, it's you and your electric scooter on the road, carefree!"
normalised: "We're aiming to make charging as convenient as filling petrol," said Professor Sharma from I I T-B. "Think 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge,' but instead of Raj and Simran on the train, it's you and your electric scooter on the road, carefree!"

unnormalised: Several companies are also installing more charging stations across major highways, including the Mumbai-Pune Expressway and the Delhi-Jaipur route. Expect to see a charging point roughly every 50 km.
normalised: Several companies are also installing more charging stations across major highways, including the Mumbai-Pune Expressway and the Delhi-Jaipur route. Expect to see a charging point roughly every fifty kilometer.

unnormalised: Talks are underway for standardized pricing, with estimates ranging from Rs. 8 to Rs. 12 per unit. So, ditch the petrol pumps and embrace the electric jhatka! Your wallet (and the planet) will thank you.
normalised: Talks are underway for standardized pricing, with estimates ranging from rupee eight to rupee twelve per unit. So, ditch the petrol pumps and embrace the electric jhatka! Your wallet (and the planet) will thank you.
